messages.message: Do we have any documentation around how we log into Loki or ElasticSearch. Can we also add in Splunk or Log Analytics in Azure Monitor?

> Do we have any documentation around how we log into Loki or ElasticSearch.
Hey @joshbronko, the architecture for sending the service logs to Loki is highlighted in following section of the doc - https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_gRcjzFoRqnyy6qaFAbk1GQ0g_eWuwvDqwZ0ECO5RsE/edit#heading=h.34l8y79iyad5

Btw, this is an internal project detail documentation.
Do we see any issue adding in Splunk?
Customers have typically integrated their K8s cluster with Splunk, so that should happen automatically.
